Status¶

Supported SVG features¶

  • All SVG path commands (arc/curves/lines/etc.)
  • Basic SVG shapes (rectangle, ellipse)
  • Per-Pixel Linear and Radial Gradients
  • Parsable color names
  • Variable line widths and miter/bevel joints

Not supported, but in progress¶

  • Patterns (partial support)
  • Effects (Drop shadow, blur, etc.)
  • More sophisticated line effects (patterns, arc joints, etc.)

Not supported¶

  • Animation
  • Text (an easy workaround is to convert text objects to paths in your editor, ie Inkscape or Illustrator)

Table Of Contents

  • Status
    • Supported SVG features
    • Not supported, but in progress
    • Not supported
